content.text:
# Draft:Ravensword: The Fallen King

Ravensword: The Fallen King is a 2009 action role-playing game developed by Crescent Moon Games and published by Chillingo for iOS devices. It is the first of two entries in the Ravensword series. Following the iOS 11 update in September 2017, which removed support for 32-bit apps, the game was de-listed from the App Store and thus became impossible to purchase.
